definitions.definition: A sport in which two opposing teams of five players strive to put a ball through a hoop .
examples: He pursued basketball as his career.

definitions.definition: The particular kind of ball used in the sport of basketball.

main_definition: ( sports , uncountable ) A sport in which two opposing teams of five players strive to put a ball through a hoop .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) The particular kind of ball used in the sport of basketball.
